title: How to Make Parkin

steps.headline: Add the margarine or butter in a heavy-based saucepan.
steps.description: Add the golden syrup and treacle at the same time and melt together over low heat.

steps.headline: Pour in milk and mix until smooth.
Put the mixture into the baking tray.
Place in the oven and bake for two hours.
Remove from oven when ready.
steps.description: Allow to cool on a wire rack.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Cut the parkin into squares for serving.

text: Preheat the oven to 325ºF (170ºC) (moderate).  Add the margarine or butter in a heavy-based saucepan. Add the golden syrup and treacle at the same time and melt together over low heat. Remove from heat.  Add the dry ingredients. Mix well. Pour in milk and mix until smooth.  Put the mixture into the baking tray.  Place in the oven and bake for two hours.  Remove from oven when ready. Allow to cool on a wire rack. Serve. Cut the parkin into squares for serving. Finished.
